Google.description: Being a homeowner can be a blessing AND a burden. When my fence blew down, I scrambled to find a company and recieve quotes for the repair. Most of the CSRs from other companies accosted me with texts and calls. If I didn't respond immediately, they moved on to the next unkowing victim. And then there was Kelly from Ergeon. Patient, kind, helpful, and ready to do whatever I needed at MY pace. When I finally contacted her, she set-up a virtual visit, sent me a variety of options, responded immediately, and was super kind in the process. I am grateful for her assistance thus far and if the rest of my experience with Ergeon is a fabulous as it has been with Kelly, I will send everyone I know to her. Thanks Kelly!
Google.name: Kt. B.
Google.title: My experience with Ergeon is fabulous

articles.description: Looking to repair or replace your fence in North Texas? There are some basics you should know when it comes to the related laws and regulations. We’ve compiled some of the most important information to consider before starting your fence project.
With the world of information on the internet- including videos, tutorials and endless online forums- there’s been a rise in interest around “Do It Yourself” or DIY projects.

Want your fence to look great and last long? One of the keys is staining! Staining your fence helps protect it from the elements and prevents a variety of problems, including fading from UV rays, splintering, and rotting.
